summary: The customer was having trouble setting up their Contoso Wireless phone and connecting to the internet. The agent helped them by guiding them through the settings menu to make sure the wifi network was enabled and the correct network was selected. The agent also provided instructions on how to download apps from the app store, such as making sure there is a data plan set up or connecting to wifi before downloading. The customer was thankful for the help and did not need any further assistance.
